short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Override the new tab page with a nearly blank one

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
open new tabs to a simple page with a few special characters on it!
simple, quick, and effective

no customizations available... just a semi-artistic clone of a new tab to blank page.

i made this specifically for my own personal use.. i didn't like any of the current blank page apps and i don't want to re-install it every day! so here it is.

if you want to use it.. go for it!
but i probably will not update it with any features.. 
i kinda really like the simplicity of it
